41  template <int structdim>
42  class TriaObject
43  {
44  public:
45  static const unsigned int dimension = structdim;
46

126 //----------------------------------------------------------------------//
127 
128  template <int structdim>
129  inline
130  TriaObject<structdim>::TriaObject ()
131  {
132  for (unsigned int i=0; i<GeometryInfo<structdim>::faces_per_cell; ++i)
133  faces[i] = -1;
134  }
135 
136 
137  template <int structdim>
138  inline
139  TriaObject<structdim>::TriaObject (const int i0,
140  const int i1)
141  {
142  Assert (structdim==1, ExcImpossibleInDim(structdim));
143  faces[0] = i0;
144  faces[1] = i1;
145  }
146 
147 
148  template <int structdim>
149  inline
150  TriaObject<structdim>::TriaObject (const int i0,
151  const int i1,
152  const int i2,
153  const int i3)
154  {
155  Assert (structdim==2, ExcImpossibleInDim(structdim));
156  faces[0] = i0;
157  faces[1] = i1;
158  faces[2] = i2;
159  faces[3] = i3;
160  }
161 
162 
163  template <int structdim>
164  inline
165  TriaObject<structdim>::TriaObject (const int i0,
166  const int i1,
167  const int i2,
168  const int i3,
169  const int i4,
170  const int i5)
171  {
172  Assert (structdim==3, ExcImpossibleInDim(structdim));
173  faces[0] = i0;
174  faces[1] = i1;
175  faces[2] = i2;
176  faces[3] = i3;
177  faces[4] = i4;
178  faces[5] = i5;
179  }
180 
181 
182  template <int structdim>
183  inline
184  int TriaObject<structdim>::face (const unsigned int i) const
185  {
186  Assert (i<GeometryInfo<structdim>::faces_per_cell,
187  ExcIndexRange(i,0,GeometryInfo<structdim>::faces_per_cell));
188  return faces[i];
189  }
190 
191 
192 
193  template <int structdim>
194  inline
195  void TriaObject<structdim>::set_face (const unsigned int i, const int index)
196  {
197  Assert (i<GeometryInfo<structdim>::faces_per_cell,
198  ExcIndexRange(i,0,GeometryInfo<structdim>::faces_per_cell));
199  faces[i] = index;
200  }
201 
202 
203 
204  template <int structdim>
205  inline
206  std::size_t
207  TriaObject<structdim>::memory_consumption ()
208  {
209  return sizeof(TriaObject<structdim>);
210  }
211 
212 
213  template <int structdim>
214  template <class Archive>
215  void TriaObject<structdim>::serialize(Archive &ar,
216  const unsigned int)
217  {
218  ar &faces;
219  }
220 
221 
222  }
223 }
